name: Clay Shooter (itch)
description:
Simple clay pigeon shooter. Computer Graphics class of 2015. Done in JAVA using libGDX and Gradle.

Controls:
WASD to move around
Mouse to look
Left-click to shoot
R to reload
1 through 4 to send clays from different throwers.

"Shoot where the bird will be not where it is."
- Unknown Hunter
